Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content:
`loopvar="0"
echo "Waiting on confirm of tx"
while [ $txval -le $loopvar ] 
do
txval=$(komodo-cli ac_name=KMDICE gettransaction $tx | jq '.confirmations')
sleep 1
done`
Will work nicely to catch the tx conf
